<script>
  const name = "World";
  function getNumber() {
    return 0;
  }
  const details = {
    address: {
      street: "Downing Street",
    },
  };
</script>
<h1>Hello, ${name}</h1>
<p>The number is: ${getNumber()}</p>
<p>The street is: ${details.address.street}</p>
==========
<html><head></head><body><h1>Hello, World</h1><p>The number is: 0</p><p>The street is: Downing Street</p></body></html>
==========
